data.title: Scottish Aviation & STEM Trail
data.meta_description: This trail sets out to commemorate Scotland's rich military and civil aviation heritage. Here you will find useful information regarding Scotland's Air Force history.
data.text:
Scottish Aviation and STEM Trail

Commemorating Aviation and STEM in Scotland

This Trail sets out to commemorate Scotlandâ€™s rich aviation heritage both Military and Civil, pulling together Youth, STEM and Veterans. The Army, the Royal Navy and the Royal Air Force have all played their part in creating this heritage as have many Civil aviators, engineers and manufacturers.

The Scottish Aviation Heritage Trail address is c/o Air Officer Scotland, 25 Learmonth Terrace, Edinburgh EH4 1NZ and that office is responsible for the Site.
